channel.title: Need help with java and making server
channel.description: How much RAM do I really need per server I have running up (or per server size like 10mb,20mb..)? I am going to get a new computer soon and am just wondering...Also, How do I install the lastest java on limited accounts?

item.title: Need help with java and making server
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

512-1gb of ram for each server. And I don’t use Vista, so I couldn’t tell you if 2gb with Vista would be slow. I use Mac.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with java and making server

item.title: Need help with java and making server
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

Oh…ok =p tyvm …but a computer with 2gb and vista can be slow cant it? Thats what I heard anyways… Wow never knew rs server took up only that little RAM… What I was going to do was 1 server for non-pking everywhere, 1 for all pk and one for testing new scripts…And I was going to put ALOT of mb’s into it …So 512-1gb is enough for all that?thx for helping =)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with java and making server

item.title: Need help with java and making server
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

You need Administrator privs to install Java, if I’m not mistaken. And it depends on how big the server is. Most wL servers are memory hogs and yeah, but if the server is not using 1 thread per client and it’s modified a lot to be good performance wise, you could live with 512mb-1gb of ram.
In other words, getting anything over 2gb just for private servers is a waste.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with java and making server
